text: Inn bastiyon kay kuch kuch qissay hum aap say biyan ker rahey hain aur inn sab kay pass unn kay payghumbar mojzaat ley ker aaye phir jiss cheez ko enhon ney ibtidaa mein jhoota keh diya yeh baat nahi hui kay phir iss ko maan letay Allah Taalaa issi tarah kafiron kay dilon per band laga deta hai
